/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by tall buildings, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the urban landscape below. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
